original_title: The Dangerous Christmas of Red Riding Hood
overview: Everyone knows the story of Red Riding Hood. But every story has two sides and now the wolf has finally told his. This original musical comedy special, with songs by Jule Styne and Bob Merrill, first aired on November 28, 1965 on ABC.
tagline: The classic Red Riding Hood story as told from the Wolf's point of view
title: The Dangerous Christmas of Red Riding Hood
